name: CompanionShip (XaviGameFolder)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left click to shoot love gun

Right click while controlling animals to return to the player

Tutorials used for general code help:

script accessing: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y7pp2gzCzUI&start=314

camera: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MFQhpwc6cKE&ab_channel=Brackeys

moving platforms (though not used in this build): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GtX1p4cwYOc&ab_channel=RootGames
